metadata.dc:title: [The inhibition of gastric acidity by the action of anticholinergic agents. Comparative study of the action of methantheline bromide and isopropamide iodide on the chlorhydria or normal and ulcerous persons, by means of the carboxylic resin method of cation exchange].
